name: The Antidote
description: The Antidote is a classic point-and-click adventure. What was supposed to be the end of a normal week at the office, turned out to be the beginning of a strange adventure. As Roger is ready to get in his car, he gets knocked unconscious on the back of his head.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP,7 Processor: Pentium or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1024*768 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Additional Notes: User can modify some setting: resolution, windowed mode, sound settings, etc.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64) processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 graphics device or higher driver Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Additional Notes: User can modify some setting: resolution, windowed mode, sound settings, etc.
